data.actual_result: They are cut off from the bottom.
data.short_description: When you set your font size to the maximum and join a voice channel and look at the VC bar, the channel name and server name are cut off. [Specific to devices with screen sizes less than or equal to 5.00 inches diagonally]
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to dark theme ( because the server name and channel name are invisible in the VC bar on light theme). - Set your font size to the maximum value possible. - Join a VC. - Get out of the VC and enter a text channel and close keyboard. - Observe the server and channel name.
